Profile: base

The base profile is a practical “minimal daily driver”: it keeps the platform simple but enables core tools like filesystem and shell.

Use it when

  • You want codebase-aware help (reading files, running commands)
  • You want fewer moving parts than dev
  • You’re working in a restricted environment (no web/search)

Expected characteristics

  • Essential tools: typical inclusions are filesystem + bash
  • Less automation: fewer agents/extra modules than dev
  • Good transparency: you can more easily reason about what the assistant can and can’t do

Tradeoffs

  • Less “batteries included” than dev (fewer specialist agents and integrations)
  • May require more manual prompting for structured workflows
